reviews.review: Marvelous Marvel Movie! Infinity War just lifted the bar for action sci-fi superheroes movie. This movie is a amazing rollercoaster ride, story telling is near perfect with excellent actors, in particular the "universe savings" villain Thanos, near perfect cgi action scenes after action scenes with an unexpected climax which will make you wonder if this movie was really 2.5 hours long. For fans this must be everyone's wet dream, all Marvel heroes got their fair share excelling and exposing on the big screen. I wish we already live in 2019.
this just pissed my off..was going good until .. way to go Marvel .. but still Wakonda forever..
Nonstop fun for sure loved it,only a few small things that would be better if changed,and also a few small things easy to miss.

Great film
Got thanos back story and kept alive all the OG AVENGERS so they probably scafices them self for the newbies

Great movie. The movie starts off so fast and with a bang, the whole movie feels like a rush of adrenaline and keeps you on the edge. The ending was extremely sobering and emotional, the movie can feel rushed at some points but none the less it was a really good movie. Will definitely see it again
It’s a universal scale freakin’ war. So so good. Cannot wait for part 2!
Best Marvel movie yet. Best villain and action in the MCU. The Russo brothers achieved the impossible with flying colors. Wow...
Loved it. Can't wait until Avengers 4 to see how this ends.

Potential spoilers: Thanos was well done. The villain formula used to build his character really makes you empathize with him. With so many superhero characters to include in one movie you never feel too far removed from any core character. I like this movie more and more as I reflect on it.

Thanos is worth the price of admission, by far the best, most formidable villian in the MCU to date. They do such a great job at making sure every character has ample screen time and displaying their abilities in very satisfying fashions. Solid story and an emotional roller coaster. I'll be seeing it again very soon.
